name: Doors Closing
description:
This game was created as part of Global Game Jam 2019.

It takes place in a fictional version of Toronto, Ontario, specifically on the TTC Subway. Our main character falls asleep on said subway, and being new to the city, doesn't know how to get home. Getting off at the next stop, his job is to talk to  everyone at the different stations and figure out how to get home.

The game's source code and team information can be found on the Global Game Jam page here: https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/doors-closing
